name: Introduction to Machine Learning
reason: This course aligns with your interest in computer science and mathematics, and it introduces methods for automated learning which is a challenging and relevant field in both disciplines.

name: Information Theory
reason: This course covers foundational concepts in measuring information and data encoding, which are crucial in both computer science and mathematics, and it provides a rigorous challenge.

name: Introduction to Software Engineering
reason: As a computer science student, understanding software engineering practices is important, and this course offers a practical introduction that will be valuable for your academic growth.

name: Engineering Large Software Systems
reason: This course builds on CSC301H1 and will deepen your understanding of software system design, which is a valuable skill in the field of computer science.

name: Algorithmic Game Theory and Mechanism Design
reason: This course combines elements of economics, mathematics, and computer science, and it offers a challenging exploration of game theory and its applications in computing.
